sections.content: This Privacy Policy applies to both the Rixx Corporation website and the 'Rixx Official' mobile application available on the Google Play Store.

We may collect the following types of personal information: name, email address, phone number (via contact forms or newsletter sign-ups), and technical/browser/device information (via tools such as Google Analytics or Firebase).
Your data is used to: respond to inquiries, personalize and improve user experience, send newsletters (if opted-in), and analyze site or app usage trends.
We use cookies and tracking technologies to improve functionality and gather usage data. Users may disable cookies through their browser settings.

The mobile app may request access to storage, internet, or device identifiers strictly for functionality. All permissions are declared within the app and required only for operational purposes. You will be prompted for consent where needed.

We integrate with services like Google Analytics, Firebase, and Google Sheets for analytics, storage, and communication. These providers operate under their own privacy terms, which users are encouraged to review.

We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to safeguard personal information. While we strive to protect data, no method is 100% secure. We do not sell or misuse your personal information.
Your personal information is retained only as long as necessary for operational, legal, or compliance purposes.
Our services are not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If such data is discovered, it will be deleted immediately upon request.
Users have the right to access, update, or request deletion of their data. Users in the EU and California may have additional rights under GDPR and CCPA.
By using our website or app, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

We allow users to create an account using their email and a password. This information is used solely for authentication and providing access to app features. We do not share account credentials with any third parties.

If you wish to request the deletion of your account or any personal data collected by our app or website, please submit your request using our secure data deletion form available at https://rixxcorp.xyz/delete-account.html. We will review and process your deletion request within 7 business days. Please ensure that the email you submit in the form matches the one associated with your account.
